title: Ranked Teams Queue - Team JustTooGood [Any Rank]
body:
With the reintro of ranked 5s teams, looking for some people who'll be on regularly during the weekends. Chill team. Play OP comps. Feed lanes, win games. Maybe DynamicQ w/out full team. 

Prefer players who'll play over the long term and have time. 

{{champion:57}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:57}}
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} Hehehe

replies.body:
I'm interested.

Main: Support
Secondary: Top lane
Rank: B3
Best Champions in the Support Role: Bard, Leona, and Alistar.
Best Champions in the Top lane: Volibear, Olaf, and Pantheon.
Availability: Primarily on weekends, but slighty reduced on week days.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
